True to size. I love the design it's one of my favorite for my son to wear. Only downside is it's one zipper. Seems to keep little man war. And the fabric has a decent stretch when tackling moving arms and kicking feet.

These honest footie pajamas are the only pajamas I put my daughter in. We love them.

This sleeper is so cute! It’s a nice soft material with a good zipper. The cotton gives it a nice lightweight feel. The patten is even cuter in person!

These are super cute, great price, but my baby is a pretty average size and the arms are so tight on him. He can’t wear them because of how tight they are. They are super stretchy, so it just doesn’t work. He cried anytime I tried to squeeze him in them.

Runs very large.

I love this sleeper! I love this brand! So soft and comfortable and is of great quality! They are the cutest little outfits and sleepers from this brand and you do t have to worry about harsh chemicals being in the manufacture process! I have been looking for Orca whale PJs forever - so happy I found these! Cotton feels to be good quality and the foldover mittens are great. 0-3 fits perfect on my long and skinny 8 week old. Nice quality. Not see-through, yet soft and stretchy. Cute pattern. True to size. I just wish it had a double zipper.

This onesie looks exactly as pictured. The material wasn’t as soft as we’d hoped for and the legs seemed a bit on the shorter side. All in all, super cute! Just wish we could’ve used it longer.
I got the preemie compass design and it is bigger than a newborn size. Don’t recommend the sizing for preemies. Also, not very soft.

I loveeee all of the products from this company and will continue to purchase. All of the designs are so cute, they’re soft, they fit really well. We have also literally had raspberry allll over them for an entire day and it still came out in the wash (after being pre treated).  The only drawback we have encountered: we did have some of the material that is sewn parallel to the zipper come unsewn, although I suppose wear and tear is bound to happen. Not sure if it’s a quality issue or just normal from a baby tugging at it. I have also noticed when he crawls his legs come out of the leg holes and start to go up into the torso section of the pajamas, which I think in part is due to how stretchy the fabric is.  My baby is a very small 10 month old, only 18.5 pounds, and he is still fitting into the 6-9 month size, for reference. And I think he will get another month or more out of this size.
Little on the thicker side but really cute! Stretchy! Fit over our boys thunder thighs.
Love the patterns on these sleepers! It is not the softest material that I have ever felt but it is not bad and makes it nice for our son to sleep in.

I really like the mitten cuffs as they are so much safer and stay put than regular mittens. I got the tie dye print first and got this dark blue next. I would have given it 5 stars if the color didn't appear so dull. It looked as if it had been washed multiple times before.

评论概述: Horrible Fabric - not soft at all
评论详情: While I absolutely love the cute design with the cactuses since I live in Arizona, the fabric is incredibly disappointing. For being “organic” the fabric is stiff and rough feeling. It’s not soft at all. It also has a bit of a weird chemical smell and I’m not sure if the ink is safe. Compared to Carters Little Planet, the fabric is atrocious! Carters Little Planet organic fabric is super soft with no weird smell while these pajamas are wholly disappointing and not to mention, pricier too!
The print is awesome and my son loves wearing them

I ordered several of these footed pajamas because I thought they’d be good quality judging from the personal care products I’d used from Honest in the past. But the fabric is not good quality (it stretches thin at the knees when putting on in ways no other baby clothing items I have do) and the zipper catches a lot. I’m disappointed and will be steering clear in the future. 🙁
So cute, and great quality. Just wish it had a double zipper.

I love the colors of this footie, especially for spring/summer! My three month old has been scratching his head/face in other brands but the fold over flaps on the arms to turn into mittens on the honest brand footies have been the best. No scratches when he wears these!
Very cute print, soft pajamas, that are a good weight and fit as expected. Only complaint is that the arm holes are tiny- I have to stretch them to be able to fit my baby’s hands through.

Cute onesies!! Love the pattern. Super recommend!

Wow so cute! These are great pajamas! They are a very comfortable material and I know my baby will be comfy and warm at night. The sizing was spot on. It is also a very functional piece of clothing for changing and such. A great brand!!
The seams ripped after 1 wash. Disappointing bc design was cute
I love these pajamas.  the size nb fit on the bigger side of newborn and smaller  size of 0-3.They are great quality and keep baby warm!

Overall, I like this sleeper. The material was fairly thick and soft and it didn’t shrink much in the wash. My only complaint is that, for the price, I wish it had a two-way zipper. Otherwise, it’s a nice, high-quality sleeper!
HonestBaby Baby Organic Cotton Footed Sleep & Play Pajamas will fit at some point.  They are well made and are good for sleep or daytime.

评论概述: Soft, high quality, easy to put on!
评论详情: This is one of our favorite pajama for our six month old. To start the design is very cute and great colors, not to flashy.  The fabric is very soft and has stood up well to many washes and retained it's softness and shape. The zipper front is great, much easier to use than snap up designs. The zipper makes it easier to change diapers and outfits quickly.  Sizing fit our child correctly. Highly recommend!

I am very impressed by the quality of HonestBaby products and these pajamas are no exception. The material is soft and the construction is top notch with even seams. I love the shades of blue. The size is as expected. You cannot go wrong for your baby or as a gift. A+

The quality of these onesies are unbeatable! They are incredibly soft. Unlike any onesie I have ever seen. The design is absolutely adorable too. The snaps are easy to close and open. Which is important for any parent. I would definitely recommend this onesie.
I ordered this as a gift for a neighbor, and it's darling! It fits true to size, and the fabric is really soft.  It makes a great gift!

评论概述: Nice and airy - and a good fit
评论详情: I can never have enough of these for my baby.  I love the print and color of this sleep n play. It is a lightweight knit which is perfect for my spring time baby.  Zipper works as needed, I have no had any issues with this one and the snap at the top is great for protecting baby’s chin.
Super soft and comfortable. The design is beautiful. Nice and artsy.

Like all honest baby clothes, the quality on this is great. They are soft, comfortable, and what I appreciate the most is that its tagless. No tags digging into my baby's neck. Don't get why all brands don't do that. Its been washed multiple times and holds up well. Totally recommend.

The material is very soft. It has stretch to it to help a newborn's baby tender body into the sleeper.It did not shrink during washing and drying.  I will definitely be ordering more sleepers from this company. I'm very happy with the quality.

This is such a sweet little footie. It definitely fits true to size. I love that it is organic cotton, so it's really nice and soft. The color scheme is really nice too. Looks so handsome and cozy on my little boy!

I got this as a gift for someone else so I can't speak personally on how it fits the baby but it's a pretty lightweight long sleeve cotton sleeper. The top of the zipper has a snap tab to keep the zipper pull safely contained where it doesn't scratch the baby. It's a little thin for winter though.

评论概述: Outside not as soft as their other products
评论详情: I love this brand, and like their other pieces it is decent weight, well made and of quality fabric. However, I did ding a star because the outside of the material is a bit scratchy. Thankfully the inside is nice and soft but even after a couple of washes this is just never going to be a soft to the touch go to jammie.

评论概述: Soft and baby loves to wear
评论详情: We love honest baby clothing and this footed sleeper is no exception. Its a bit stiff straight out of the bag, but softens with washing before using. The colors are true to what you see on screen. The sizing seems fairly accurate if not a bit generous. This would make an excellent shower gift.

To start with, I usually buy Carter’s. That is my comparison. This sleep and play measures up. It is true to size. It is good quality. It doesn’t have weird washing instructions like so much on Amazon. It’s machine washable and can go in the dryer. The weight is what I expected. It is lightweight but not tissue paper thin, the perfect weight for a sleep and play. My favorite part is how adorable the pattern is. The pattern is different from so much of the other baby clothes out there. The material doesn’t have the give that Carter’s has, but that is a non-issue really. I wouldn’t hesitate to get this brand again.
I love the color and print of the fabric; it washed well and seems sturdy. It’s not that soft, but other than that I have no complaints.

This is a basic zippered footed sleeper made from organic cotton. Zippered onesies > snaps so this has that going for it! Easy to get on and off. I like the tie dye print and the fact that it’s certified organic. The onesie isn’t super soft but maybe after a few washes it’ll break in a little more and feel less stiff.
